title: Does Jayce consider as a melee?
body: I am playing on completing the melee only mission but i dont know if jayce counts as a range

replies.body: [**Per the list HollyMonster put out**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/5vaP89wT-list-of-current-ranged-champions-for-missions), it looks like Jayce is considered ranged. I'm assuming it's because his base form is ranged.
Jayce's base form is melee. He has to transform for ranged.
